name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: The ultimate wireless mouse for productivity. Features an 8K DPI sensor, quiet clicks, MagSpeed electromagnetic scrolling, and ergonomic design. Works on any surface including glass. USB-C rechargeable with 70-day battery life.

reviews.review_text: Best mouse I have ever used. The ergonomics are perfect for long coding sessions.
MagSpeed scroll wheel is a game changer for browsing large codebases.
Pricey but worth every penny. Battery lasts forever.
